pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Enabling dynamic linking for Windows build

content.raw:
I just tried compiling on my desktop Ubuntu machine, and the build proceeds farther, but still fails to link `gzclient`:

~~~
[ 75%] Linking CXX executable gzclient
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::names'
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::range'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
~~~
content.html:
I just tried compiling on my desktop Ubuntu machine, and the build proceeds farther, but still fails to link gzclient:

[ 75%] Linking CXX executable gzclient
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::names'
libgazebo_gui.so.9.6.0: undefined reference to `gazebo::common::EnumIface<gazebo::common::MaterialType>::range'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
